title: Korea Pilgrimage with NBN
body: When I finally get the NBN, it will be possible for me take a trip to the Korean servers. Here I will hone my skills in their ranked dojo, to make it to silver. With this granted knowledge of the inner workings of League, I will return to OCE and make my way to diamond.

replies.body: Don't you have to be a Korean citizen to play on their servers?

Yeah need a Korean Social Security Number (KSSN) or Alien Certificate of Registration (ACR) [certifying you are a foreign visitor] to play on their Servers (They have strict laws and stand heavy against cyber crime so this is to keep their games etc secure).
